articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.title: Researchers discovered what causes one of the most dangerous coronavirus symptoms - BGR
articles.description: Doctors learned early on in the pandemic that the novel coronavirus causes blood clots that can lead to unexpected symptoms, including strokes and heart attacks. Since these COVID-19 complications can be life-threatening, doctors have been treating patients w…
articles.content:
